subject: Conference Poll
msgSnippet: Folks, In 2003, there were two North American conferences on XP/Agile Methods: XP/Agile Universe and the Agile Development Conference.  Going forward, we would
messageBody:
Folks,

In 2003, there were two North American conferences on XP/Agile Methods:
XP/Agile Universe and the Agile Development Conference. Going forward,
we would like to know if you favor merging the conferences together or
keeping them separate. To cast your vote, please follow these steps:

1. Join the ConferencePoll yahoogroup:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/conferencepoll/
2. Go to the Polls section:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/conferencepoll/polls
3. Click on the Poll's URL and then cast your vote.

Voting ends on October 1st, 2003.

thanks and regards,
jk

p.s. my apologies if you get this email more than once.

I n d u s t r i a l L o g i c , I n c .
Joshua Kerievsky
